mapper.select: SELECT dd.draft_doc_no draftDocNo, dt.tmp_no tmpNo, e.emp_name empName, dt.tmp_name tmpName, dd.title title, dd.doc_approver_state_no docApproverStateNo, dd.create_datetime createDatetime FROM draft_doc dd INNER JOIN doc_referrer dr ON dd.draft_doc_no = dr.draft_doc_no INNER JOIN doc_tmp dt ON dd.tmp_no = dt.tmp_no INNER JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE dr.referrer_emp_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY dd.create_datetime DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS zeroState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS oneState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS twoState, SUM(CASE WHEN dd.doc_approver_state_no = 9 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS nineState FROM draft_doc dd LEFT JOIN emp e ON dd.drafter_emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN doc_referrer dr ON dd.draft_doc_no = dr.draft_doc_no WHERE dr.referrer_emp_no = #{empNo}
